item.title: Rifle Club Review | A Mild Wild West Set In the Western Ghats - Lensmen Reviews
item.description:
Rifle Club Review | A Mild Wild West Set In the Western Ghats

Publication Date: December 19, 2024

Source: Lensmen Reviews

The movie Rifle Club creatively merges the Wild West theme with the scenic backdrop of Kerala's hill stations. It follows a Malayalam superstar's training day at a rifle club in 1991, culminating in an engaging face-off between rival gangs.

  • The film's runtime is approximately 114 minutes.
  • A focus on character development and the club's dynamics.
  • The screenplay draws parallels between the narrative and hunting.
  • Strong performances by Dileesh Pothan (Avaran) and Anurag Kashyap (as the antagonist).
  • Vibrant cinematography and a notable musical score enhance the film‚Äôs ambiance.
‚ÄúWhile the pre-climax face-off between the two gangs is pretty slick and engaging, somewhere, I felt the finale needed a bit more refinement to have that wow factor.‚Äù

The film offers a blend of humor and intensity, though it concludes with a slightly underwhelming finale. However, it reassures viewers that Aashiq Abu's creative prowess remains intact.

Yashvardhan Ahuja, the son of the legendary actor Govinda, is set to make his debut in a yet untitled love story directed by National Award winner Sai Rajesh, scheduled to begin filming in 2025. This marks the continuation of Govinda's cinematic legacy through his son.

  • Yashvardhan has auditioned and secured his role in the film based on merit.
  • The film aims to create a unique love story with original music to enhance the narrative.
  • A nationwide search for the female lead is ongoing, with over 14,000 audition clips submitted so far.
  • Producers are looking to begin filming by summer 2025.
‚ÄúThe yet untitled love story will bring the second generation of Govinda‚Äôs legacy to the big screen,‚Äù revealed a source.

This film not only represents a new chapter for Yashvardhan but also a continuation of his father's impactful career in Indian cinema.

item.title: Laapataa Ladies' Oscars drama explained: How India selects 'official' entry, what is Film Federation of India's role - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Laapataa Ladies' Oscars Drama Explained: How India Selects Official Entry

Date: Dec 19, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

As Laapataa Ladies crashes out of the Oscars race, this article explores the selection process for India's 'official' entry to the Academy Awards, shedding light on the role of the Film Federation of India.

  • This year marks the 23rd consecutive year that India will not have a film in the Oscars' Best International Feature Film category.
  • The Film Federation of India (FFI) is responsible for selecting India's official entry for the Oscars.
  • Laapataa Ladies was chosen from nearly 30 contenders, including notable films like Animal and All We Imagine as Light.
  • Only one film can be submitted as an 'official' entry, but filmmakers can still submit titles independently for other categories.
  • Historically, three Indian films have been nominated for the Oscars: Mother India, Salaam Bombay, and Lagaan.
‚ÄúIt has never been without drama.‚Äù

The ongoing struggles in selecting a film for international representation highlight the challenges faced by Indian cinema on the global stage.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: After Hera Pheri, Tabu reunites with Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan on Bhooth Bangla franchise - PINKVILLA
item.description:

Bhooth Bangla is set to mark a significant comeback of the beloved duo on screen in a new comedic horror setting.

item.title: Arbaaz Khan visits ex-wife Malaika Arora‚Äôs new restaurant with parents, sans wife Sshura. Watch video - The Indian Express
item.description:
Arbaaz Khan visits ex-wife Malaika Arora‚Äôs new restaurant with parents, sans wife Sshura. Watch video

Date: Wednesday, December 12, 2024 Source: The Indian Express

The Khan family had a heartwarming reunion in Mumbai at a lunch hosted by Malaika Arora, attended by her ex-husband Arbaaz Khan and their son Arhaan, marking a rare family outing.

  • Arbaaz Khan visited the restaurant with his parents, Salim and Salma Khan, and Helen.
  • Notably, his wife Sshura was absent from the gathering.
  • Videos circulated showing Arhaan assisting his grandmother while climbing the restaurant stairs.
  • The family continues to share a strong bond despite the separation of Arbaaz and Malaika.
  • Malaika was seen greeting guests in a stylish black outfit.
‚ÄúHe resembles his father, Arbaaz, in both habits and personality.‚Äù - Malaika Arora on her son, Arhaan.

This gathering illustrates the ongoing co-parenting relationship between Arbaaz and Malaika, despite their past marriage and subsequent divorce.

item.title: OTT Review: Leela Vinodham ‚Äì Telugu film on ETV Win - 123telugu
item.description:
Leela Vinodham Telugu Movie Review

Release Date: December 19, 2024

Source: 123telugu.com

Leela Vinodham is the latest web film that premiered today on ETV Win. Popular YouTuber Shanmukh Jaswanth and the charming Anagha Ajith play the lead roles. Read our review to find out how it measures up.

Key Points

  • The story is set in 2008, focusing on a student, PMRK Prasad, who struggles to express his feelings for his classmate, Leela.
  • It captures the uncertainty of teenage love and nostalgia for the era before mobile phones were commonplace.
  • Shanmukh Jaswanth and Anagha Ajith deliver decent performances, with Mirchi Saran standing out for his comedic role.
  • The screenplay has issues with pacing, and certain scenes feel slow and underdeveloped.
  • While the film has appealing elements, it ultimately does not deliver a memorable experience.
‚ÄúLeela Vinodham is a village love story that works in a few parts but ultimately falls short of being memorable.‚Äù

In conclusion, while the film captures a nostalgic charm and has commendable performances, it struggles with pacing and emotional depth. Viewers might find other entertainment options more satisfying.

item.title: Central India Crowns Pushpa 2 as the All-Time Box Office Champion, Surpassing Baahubali 2 - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Central India Crowns Pushpa 2 as the All-Time Box Office Champion, Surpassing Baahubali 2

Publication Date: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Pushpa 2 has officially become the highest-grossing film in Central India, with box office collections reaching Rs. 135 crore nett, surpassing the previous record held by Baahubali 2, which earned Rs. 123 crore.

  • Pushpa 2's total box office collections in India stand at Rs. 552.50 crore nett.
  • The film is set to close the gap with other top-grossing films, including Stree 2 and Jawan.
  • Pushpa 2 is especially popular in Central India, which includes Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, and parts of Gujarat and Maharashtra.
  • Only two other films have crossed Rs. 100 crore in Central India: Gadar 2 and Stree 2.
‚ÄúPushpa 2 is expected to widen the gap by a final number of over Rs. 175 crore.‚Äù

This achievement underscores the growing dominance of regional films in the Indian box office, challenging the traditional Bollywood hits.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna isn‚Äôt sold on Ranbir Kapoor as Lord Ram in Ramayana: ‚ÄòIf you‚Äôre a lampat chhichhora in real life‚Ä¶‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna Questions Ranbir Kapoor's Casting as Lord Ram in Ramayana

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Mukesh Khanna has voiced concerns over the casting of Ranbir Kapoor as Lord Ram in the upcoming Ramayana adaptation, suggesting that Kapoor's real-life persona could affect audience perception of the sacred role.

  • Khanna has a history of controversial comments, previously criticizing other adaptations of religious texts.
  • He fears that Kapoor‚Äôs past role in Animal, known for its negative themes, may impact his portrayal of Ram.
  • Khanna believes that the actor who plays Ram must embody the character's ideals and should not resemble a 'lampat chhichhora'.
  • He cautioned filmmakers to consider audience acceptance when casting iconic characters.
  • The film directed by Nitesh Tiwari is set for a Diwali 2026 release.
‚ÄúWhoever plays Ram must embody Ram; he shouldn‚Äôt look like Raavan. In their real life, if they are a (lampat chhichhora) lewd hooligan, then it will show on screen.‚Äù

Khanna‚Äôs comments raise significant discussion about the portrayal of Lord Ram in modern cinema, stressing the importance of actor suitability for such portrayal.

Tollywood star Ram Charan, a devoted follower of Lord Ayyappa, is set to conclude his Ayyappa Deeksha this year in Dallas, Texas, prior to a major film event.

  • Ram Charan has performed Ayyappa Deeksha regularly for several years.
  • This year, he has been in Deeksha for over a month.
  • He will end his Deeksha at the Ayyappa Swamy temple in Dallas on December 21, hours before the pre-release event of his film Game Changer.

‚ÄúGame Changer is one of the most eagerly awaited biggies in India.‚Äù

item.description:
Mamta Kulkarni Clarifies She's Not Returned to Mumbai for Bollywood

Publication Date: [Date of Publication] Source: [Source Name]

Mamta Kulkarni, who recently returned to Mumbai after 25 years, has made it clear that she does not plan to make a comeback as an actress.

  • Kulkarni stated, 'I have not come back for Bollywood and I am not planning to make a return as an actress.'
  • She spoke about her relationship with Vicky Goswami, emphasizing her lack of ties to the drug world.
  • A non-bailable warrant was issued against her and Goswami in connection with a drug investigation in 2017.
  • Kulkarni shared her emotional experience of returning to India after two decades.
  • She has expressed feelings of nostalgia upon revisiting her homeland.
‚ÄúNow, I am not in touch with him, I last contacted him in 2016.‚Äù

The article highlights Kulkarni's personal reflections and connections to her past as she re-establishes her presence in Mumbai.

item.title: Nita Ambani was coming out of a shop when an angry woman...; her bodyguard was.., watch viral video - India.com

Nita Ambani, the wife of Mukesh Ambani, was recently filmed in a lighthearted incident while exiting a boutique in Bengaluru. As she prepared to leave in her luxury car, an encounter with a local woman went viral, showcasing an unexpected moment of exchange.

item.title: Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024: Check here Astrological prediction for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Daily Horoscope: Find out Astrological predictions for December 19, 2024

Published On: Dec 19, 2024

Source: Ayush Bisht

Explore your astrological insights for all zodiac signs today, including predictions for love, health, money, and career.

  • Aries: Patience in emotional conversations, increased material resources, attractive job proposals.
  • Taurus: Focus on garnering support and effective communication; work-related travel may occur.
  • Gemini: Relationship improvement and attractive proposals; focus on health and personality.
  • Cancer: Increased creativity and successful partnerships; progress on pending tasks.
  • Leo: Keep control over budgets; maintain readiness for professional matters.
  • Virgo: Commercial opportunities expand with noteworthy financial gains expected.
  • Libra: Professionals will excel; opportunities for managerial benefits increase.
  • Scorpio: Focus on spiritual growth and higher education; favorable commercial matters.
  • Sagittarius: Emphasis on following rules and personal engagement with family.
  • Capricorn: Professional harmony; opportunities in trade and industry will be present.
  • Aquarius: Focus on hard work; cautiousness with finances is advised.
  • Pisces: Strong professional presence and interest in religious and modern subjects.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 14 [updated live]: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna‚Äôs film hits Rs 973 - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 14 [Updated Live]

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

The mass entertainer ‚ÄòPushpa 2‚Äô, starring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, continues to set records at the box office even after two weeks of release, nearing the Rs 1000 crore mark.

  • As of day 14, the film has collected a total of Rs 973.2 crore in India across all languages.
  • The day-wise collection indicates a steady performance, with notable earnings across Telugu (Rs 293.3 Cr) and Hindi (Rs 607.35 Cr).
  • The film is only Rs 26.2 crore short of reaching the Rs 1000 crore club.
  • 'Pushpa 2' has received a 3.5-star rating from ETimes, with praise for its direction and narrative depth.
‚ÄúDirector Sukumar‚Äôs brilliance shines through in 'Pushpa 2: The Rule.'‚Äù

‚ÄòPushpa 2‚Äô is set to be released on OTT in February 2025, with Netflix acquiring the rights for its streaming.
